entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Alliston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:10 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then periods of snow. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of freezing rain or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain changing to periods of rain near noon. High plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Showers and drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023
